ComicInfo.Title: Get Well Soon, Charlie Brown!
ComicInfo.Summary:
With the excitement and love we got for our oversized issue #25 special, we wanted to treat readers to another full-length adventure. Coming in at 22 pages, “Get Well Soon, Charlie Brown!” will remind readers why we all can’t help but love good ol’ Charlie Brown.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Charles M. Schulz (a), Donna Almendrala (d) & Scott Newman (d) | 1 | RE | BOOM! Studios Exclusive "Aaughh!" First Appearance Cover | Charles M. Schulz (a) & Nomi Kane (d) | Missing |

ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Alexis E. Fajardo, Shannon Watters
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Linus van Pelt, Lucy van Pelt, Peppermint Patty, Sally Brown, Schroeder, Snoopy
